description: Number of zeros in numbers 1 to 999..9 (n digits).
comments: Also the first n places of 1, ..., n-digit numbers in the almost-natural numbers (A007376). - _Erich Friedman_.
references: M. Kraitchik, Mathematical Recreations. Dover, NY, 2nd ed., 1953, p. 49.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (21,-120,100).
author: Olivier Gorin (gorin(AT)roazhon.inra.fr)
